channel.title: Music on DJ Lorenzo

item.title: The Fundamental Styles of Tango with Ignacio Varchausky
item.description: Do not miss the seminar with Ignacio Varchausky Friday May 25 at Kavakava Tango!!! Ignacio is well known as member of Orquesta El Arranque, and for his work on transmitting knowledge of tango music to the new generation of tango musicians through Orquesta Escuela de Tango and TangoVia. He just released the book The Bass in Tango in the series “MÃ©todo de tango”. Transmitting tango knowledge to a wider audience is of great importance to Ignacio, and he has a weekly radio show at the Buenos Aires tango radio La 2x4.
